amendment.description: Amendment sought to terminate all existing Federal milk marketing orders on January 1, 2001.
amendment.purpose: Amendment no. 8 printed in part B of H.Rept. 106-324 to terminate all existing Federal milk marketing orders on January 1, 2001.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boehner amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 124 - 302 (Roll no. 435).
